### cycleStart() {#ab18add1ebf835902d6a2dd4feaa80719}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="llvm::Error llvm::mca::InOrderIssueStage::cycleStart ()"
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Called once at the start of each cycle.

This can be used as a setup phase to prepare for the executions during the cycle.

### canExecute() {#a6ca2ce603320d6244e3b3bd67c348306}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool llvm::mca::InOrderIssueStage::canExecute (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/instref">InstRef</a> &amp; IR)</>}>
Returns true if IR can execute during this cycle.

In case of stall, it updates <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/si">SI</a> with information about the stalled instruction and the stall reason.

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="unsigned llvm::mca::InOrderIssueStage::LastWriteBackCycle">
